price: 107. Dan janganlah kamu berdebat untuk (membela) orang-orang yang mengkhianati dirinya. Sungguh, Allah tidak menyukai orang-orang yang selalu berkhianat dan bergelimang dosa,
arabic: وَلَا تُجَٰدِلۡ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡتَانُونَ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَن كَانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tujādil ʿani alladhīna yakhtānūna anfusahum inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu man kāna khawwānan athīman
